cont.entity_a: The product description did not match the actual item, missing strap and incorrect camera model.
cont.entity_b: Missing focusing ring not mentioned in the description.

cont.entity_a: Item was in bad condition with missing settings indicator and side cover.
cont.entity_b: The camera body was in good condition, but the battery life was short.

cont.entity_a: The camera works and takes nice pictures, with easy-to-use features and online manual access. Fast picture-taking speed, good for capturing moments with children. Easy to use with good automatic mode and customizable settings.
cont.entity_b: Great for landscapes and portraits, with a preference for full-frame. Low-light performance is impressive with minimal noise. Older model but provides superb image quality and control. Heavy and lacks some modern features but remains a solid choice for serious photographers.

cont.entity_a: DSLR option, suitable for beginners with various settings.
Received extra battery and memory card. Some models had missing accessories and were dusty or dirty.
Camera had focus, flash, and busy signal issues, requiring potential repair. Battery and computer sync issues, making image retrieval difficult.
Camera is lightweight and easy to carry.
Older model but functions well, though some parts may be missing or require repair.
cont.entity_b: Durable and reliable with a strong build.
Canon's service will stop after September 2015, as parts will not be available.
